Partner Description

{% widget_block rich_text "module_1460101833575172680" overrideable=True, cell=False, cells='[]', root=False, row=False, wrapping_html='', label='Rich Text' %} {% widget_attribute "html" %}

ArkusNexus was founded in 2004 and joined the ACE Partner Network in 2015. Based in San Diego, California, ArkusNexus also maintains development offices in Tijuana, Mexico. This allows for seamless communication with the development team, as well as providing an outstanding option for clients looking for a convenient timezone and culture match to the United States.

 

Working with technologies such as Android, AngularJS, iOS, C#, HTML5, JAVA, and RoR, ArkusNexus puts a strong focus on user experience, ensuring their software is visually appealing and highly usable. ArkusNexus is deadline focused while adhering to Agile best practices and giving their clients full visibility of the process as itâ€™s happening. With more than 100 developers in constant communication, ArkusNexus has the ability to cater a team to your specific needs as a client.

 

Regardless of scale, ArkusNexus provides their clients with well-written software and pride themselves on their quick time-to-market. With experience in both mobile and web products in industries such as insurance, marketing, education, and entertainment, the services ArkusNexus provide span all phases of the software development lifecycle.
